title: Halo Infinite Coming Fall 2021 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.09.20
description:
Greg and Gary talk about Halo's delay, Xbox Game Pass Ultimate coming to iOS, and Game Awards expectations.

00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
Andy is going to be streaming Cyberpunk 2077 showing off Ray Tracing and all that goodness on his Nvidia RTX 3080 Thursday December 10th from 1-3 PT and then Tuesday December 15th from  11-1 PT 
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report   -
00:05:40 - Halo Infinite Coming Fall 2021
00:13:35 - With the news of Halo infinite now slated for a fall 2021 release I would like to get your take on what this could do to the series now heading toward a 6 year lull without a mainline halo release. - Best Friends Q:BCOSTA56
00:30:25 - Xbox Game Pass coming to iOS, PC!, Jerret West on the Wire
00:36:08 - Not a Q but a round-up of some xbox news  - Best Friends Q:drewvenator
00:39:01 - Game Awards Announcements, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:48:40 -  Ad  
00:54:44 - Cyberpunk DLC Comes in Early 2021, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:57:15 - Control’s Sold More than 2 Million Units, James Batchelor @ GIB
00:59:35 - UPDATES
01:02:15 - Out today
01:03:35 - Squad Up:CartmanVT(Reddit) - CartmanVT
01:03:59 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
